transArray.content: The location is very good, less than 10 minutes away from Wukesong Huaxi Live Plaza. There are Porsche and Mercedes-Benz 4S stores in the courtyard. You can park in the park for free. Screen projection is available in the room, and free drinks are provided in the double roomðŸ¥¤.

Dear guest, hello! Thank you for staying at Orange Beijing Wukesong Hotel. Our hotel is located on the West Fourth Ring Road, with very convenient transportation. It is very close to the 301 Hospital, the subway and the bus station, and the hotel provides electronic parking coupons for free parking. Travel routes can be diversified according to your travel mode. At the same time, the room is fully equipped with electric curtains, refrigerated refrigerators, and snacks and fresh oranges are provided at the front desk. I hope it can bring you good memories and sincere expectations. Your next visit! Manager: Zhao Dan
